text:
Lori Nelson (born Dixie Kay Nelson; August 15, 1933 – August 23, 2020) was an American actress and model. She was active in the 1950s and early 1960s. She was best known for her roles in the TV series "How to Marry a Millionaire" and the movies "Revenge of the Creature", "All I Desire", and "I Died a Thousand Times".
Nelson died on August 23, 2020 from Alzheimer's disease-related problems in Los Angeles, aged 87.
